verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> concerning the Philistines,<WH6430> before that Pharaoh<WH6547> struck<WH5221> Gaza.<WH5804>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> Behold,<WH4325> waters rise up<WH5927> out of the north,<WH6828> and shall become an overflowing<WH7857> stream,<WH5158> and shall overflow<WH7857> the land<WH776> and all that is therein,<WH4393> the city<WH5892> and those who dwell<WH3427> therein;<WH120> and the men shall cry,<WH2199> and all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> shall wail.<WH3213>

At the noise<WH6963> of the stamping<WH8161> of the hoofs<WH6541> of his strong<WH47> ones,<WH7494> at the rushing of his chariots,<WH7393> at the rumbling<WH1995> of his wheels,<WH1534> the fathers<WH1> don't<WH6437> look back to their children<WH1121> for feebleness<WH7510> of hands;<WH3027>

because of the day<WH3117> that comes<WH935> to destroy<WH7703> all the Philistines,<WH6430> to cut off<WH3772> from Tyre<WH6865> and Sidon<WH6721> every helper<WH5826> who remains:<WH8300> for Yahweh<WH3068> will destroy<WH7703> the Philistines,<WH6430> the remnant<WH7611> of the isle<WH339> of Caphtor.<WH3731>
Baldness<WH7144> has come<WH935> on Gaza;<WH5804> Ashkelon<WH831> is brought to nothing,<WH1820> the remnant<WH7611> of their valley:<WH6010> how long will you cut yourself?<WH1413>
You<WH1945> sword<WH2719> of Yahweh,<WH3068> how long will it be before<WH3808> you be quiet?<WH8252> Put up<WH622> yourself into your scabbard;<WH8593> rest,<WH7280> and be still.<WH1826>
How can you be quiet,<WH8252> since Yahweh<WH3068> has given you a command?<WH6680> Against Ashkelon,<WH831> and against the<WH3220> seashore,<WH2348> there has he appointed it.<WH3259>
